American study abroad students...take note!(Well, don't.  Let's not spoil this local gem).Amazingly delicious, fresh food!  Free wifi!  Cafe/restaurant during the day, more of a bar at night.  Located in the perfect Placa del Tripi (if you can find it)!  This was my go-to spot while I was studying abroad.  Amazing service, such great food, and seriously the coolest vibe.GET THE VEGGIE BURGER!  BEST I've ever had!
